metadata.title: CVE-2021-43779 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: GLPI is an open source IT Asset Management, issue tracking system andservice desk system. The GLPI addressing plugin in versions < 2.9.1 suffersfrom authenticated Remote Code Execution vulnerability, allowing access tothe server's underlying operating system using command injection abuse offunctionality. There is no workaround for this issue and users are advisedto upgrade or to disable the addressing plugin.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
